Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.1 Paṭiccavāra » 2.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 2.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Napacchājāta-naāsevana
Kusalattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Napacchājāta-naāsevana
41.
229Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā—  kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca…pe… .
230Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—  kusalaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca…pe… . (Napacchājātapaccayampi naāsevanapaccayampi naadhipatipaccayasadisaṃ.)
<< Napurejātaup Nakamma >>
